schedules: Operating times: 5:30 AM to 12:30 AM, frequency: 2-5 minutes
costs: Fare ranges from SGD 1.74 to SGD 2.70

description: The Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) is a convenient way to travel to and from Changi Airport. The CG2 Changi Airport Station is located in the basement of Terminals 2 and 3, and operates from 5:30 AM to 12:30 AM. The fare ranges from SGD 1.74 to SGD 2.70, and the typical travel time to the city is 30 minutes. Wheelchair access is available, making it a suitable option for passengers with mobility needs. To use the MRT, simply purchase a ticket at the station and follow the signs to the platform.

description: Taxis are a convenient and door-to-door way to travel to and from Changi Airport. Taxis operate 24/7 and can be found at the taxi stands at each terminal. The fare ranges from SGD 20 to SGD 40, plus surcharges and tolls. Some taxis have wheelchair access, but it's best to book in advance to confirm. To use a taxi, simply proceed to the taxi stand and follow the signs to the taxi queue.

description: Driving to and from Changi Airport is a convenient option for those who prefer to travel in the comfort of their own vehicle. Parking fees apply, and drivers should be aware of tolls and fuel costs. The typical travel time to the city is 30-60 minutes, depending on traffic conditions. To drive to the airport, simply follow the signs to the terminal and park in one of the available car parks.
